tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_provider_credentials (
    provider_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    license_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issuing_authority VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    license_expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE doctor_credentials (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  license_number VARCHAR(20),
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64)
);

CREATE TABLE license_verification (
  verification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_id INT,
  verification_date DATE,
  verified_by VARCHAR(50),
  validity_status BOOLEAN,
  blockchain_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE credentials (
    credential_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    credential_type VARCHAR(50),
    credential_description TEXT,
    issue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE provider_credentials (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    license_number VARCHAR(50),
    verification_date DATE,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE license_status (
    license_number VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    is_valid BOOLEAN,
    issued_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id UUID,
    license_number VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE provider_credentials (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  license_number VARCHAR(50),
  certification_type VARCHAR(50),
  certification_date DATE,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64)
);

CREATE TABLE license_history (
  license_number VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  license_status VARCHAR(20),
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64)
);
